content.query:
-- Checking Combine Meta and Sensor Data
SELECT
    TOP 50 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://projectwatercrisis.dfs.core.windows.net/waterstorageaccount/ML_Folder/raw_data.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
ORDER BY [result].[C1]
